page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA
page.content: The main types of employment in{Hurst {Green}are: {Factories}which each employ about 100 people{ {Shops}which each employ a few people {Schools}which employ a number of teachers. During the past few years lots of new houses have been built and so there are many small building and home improvement businesses. There are also a few farms, but most people commute to London or the other large towns nearby. In{Holland Road, Hurst Green}there is an{Industrial Estate,}where bathroom equipment, saunas etc., heating and melting equipment and electronic devices are made.
